thread.section_title: Pullman Paris Montparnasse - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice choice in Paris.
thread.title_full: Nice choice in Paris. - Review of Pullman Paris Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kim1299J
title: Nice choice in Paris.
text: Love Paris and have stayed in numerous hotels in Paris from 3 stars to 5 stars but from now on will always stay here again if the rate is right. Good size hotel room and not as small like all other hotels rooms, professional staff and great location near the station. The bar is very nice and drinks are not overpriced for a hotel in Paris and it feels very relaxed. Breakfast also great.
